title: Cincinnati Bengals vs. Buffalo Bills Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015
text:
Point Spread Odds: Bengals -2 1/2 points 
Over Under Total: 45 points. 
Money Line: Bengals -133 odds with Bills +113 odds 
Notes: The Cincinnati Bengals are 5-0 with the 27-24 home victory last week to the Seattle Seahawks as a -3   went over 44 Â½ points. The team overcame a 24-7 deficit after three quarters to force the overtime period. Andy Dalton had a good game passing the football with 331 yards passing and two touchdown throws. Cincinnati is second best in the NFL in total offense producing 421 yards per game. 
Buffalo is 3-2 following the 14-13 road victory last week to the Tennessee Titans as a +1 point wagering underdog. The total went under 43 points. The Bills won with just 209 yards of offense. They threw for just 109 yards and survived four quarterback sacks. Buffalo is ranked 24th in the NFL in passing defense by giving up 274 yards per game through the air. 
Cincinnati Bengals versus Buffalo Bills Free Pick : This NFL
